Post-it notes as bookmarks: Attach a small post-it note to the top of a book page to mark your favorite quotes, passages, or pages for easy reference.
Post-it notes as a mini calendar: Use post-it notes to create a custom calendar on a whiteboard or a corkboard, marking important dates and events.
Post-it notes as a visual reminder system: Place post-it notes on a whiteboard or a window to remind family members of tasks, appointments, or chores.
Post-it notes as a creative brainstorming tool: Use them to collect ideas during meetings or brainstorming sessions, allowing participants to easily share and contribute to the discussion.
Post-it notes as a decorative storage solution: Attach post-it notes to the inside of drawers or cabinets to label items or indicate storage instructions.
